Incident Title: Unable to login, error pops up saying 'Password incorrect'
Incident Description: Account was locked after too many attempts
Incident Resolution: User contacted Ops team (exampleOpsForPBS@email.com) to unlock account, user could log in
Affected Person Department: Sur - Anaesthesio, Intsv Care & Pain Med

Incident Title: 'No authorisation to view PBS Finance Reports tab' error appears when user tries to click on Finance Reports tab
Incident Description: Finance user cannot access PBS Finance Reports tab as authorisation had not been given yet.
Incident Resolution: User to go to Go-Live chatbot and request for access via the Request Authorisation Form feature

Incident Title: Card machine (UPOS) did not trigger after clicking collect payment button in Manage Cashdesk tab
Incident Description: User accidentally closed startUpBridge.exe before collecting payment
Incident Resolution: startUpBridge.exe should automatically be open upon user logging into computer, users to make sure that startUpBridge.exe is open before collecting payment. If UPOS still not triggering, close and reopen the startUpBridge.exe.

Incident Title: Cash desk history not reflecting the payment after it was made
Incident Description: User refreshed page while collecting payment, thus payment was not captured
Incident Resolution: Manual posting of payment (PSA manually type in card details in Manage Cashdesk tab in PBS), users to make sure payment has fully processed before leaving Manage Cashdesk tab

Incident Description: Medisave balance showed up as zero on PBS, hence could not validate scheme. This is because user did not ask patient to sign Medical Claims Authorisation Form (MCAF)
Incident Resolution: After signing form, Medisave balance was validated on PBS and scheme could be activated.

Incident Title: Unable to activate Medisave Chronic Disease Management Programme (CDMP) / MSV500700 scheme
Incident Description: User cannot activate scheme even though patient has diagnosis eligible for CDMP scheme. Found that chronic diagnosis is missing from PBS as diagnosis does not flow from Medical Record system to PBS for a Technical Visit
Incident Resolution: User to fill diagnosis in manually in PBS for Technical Visits.

Incident Title: MT Band / Subsidy schemes not showing on PBS Manage Billable Event (MBE) page for patient
Incident Description: Connection between National Means Testing System (NMTS) and PBS was down when user was checking PBS.
Incident Resolution: When connection between NMTS and PBS is down, user is to manually fetch subsidy information using the button on the top right corner of the MBE page. Subsidy information will automatically populate after clicking the button.

Incident Title: Slowness in loading Manage Patient Bills (MPB) tab
Incident Description: MPB tab took >2 minutes to load
Incident Resolution: PBS was going through an update, hence system was slow. In such cases, users are advised to check the chatbot for PBS system status.

Incident Title: Medication charges not flowing from pharmacy system to PBS for patient undergoing surgery in hospital
Incident Description: PBS command centre is currently withholding charges for patients in Emergency Department (ED) and Day Surgery (DS) healthcare settings, which patient is under, to avoid slowness in system. Hence why charges have not flown to PBS.
Incident Resolution: Daily batch job will run at midnight to trigger charges to PBS. Users advised to wait and check charges the next day.

Incident Title: Staff benefit payor code not showing up in PBS
Incident Description: Payor code QAXBYCZ not found in PBS, need code to give staff discount.
Incident Resolution: Finance needs to review payor code and submit it to be deployed in PBS for the hospital. User to report this issue using Reporting Issue feature in chatbot.
